---
id: pix-dict-claim-confirm-v-2
title: "Confirm a DICT claim"
description: "Confirms the claim operation. As a consequence, the link between the key and the donor participant is removed."
sidebar_label: "Confirm a DICT claim"
hide_title: true

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Confirm a DICT claim"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/claim/{claimId}/confirm"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Confirms the claim operation. As a consequence, the link between the key and the donor participant is removed.

Status must be in `WAITING_RESOLUTION`.

For ownership claims, if the reason is `DEFAULT_OPERATION`, the resolution period (`ResolutionPeriodEnd`)
   must have passed. If the reason given is `USER_REQUESTED`, the closing period (`CompletionPeriodEnd`)
   will be advanced to allow for immediate termination by the claimant.

The table below defines, depending on the reason and type, who can confirm.

<table>
   <thead>
     <tr>
       <th></th>
       <th colspan="2">OWNERSHIP</th>
       <th colspan="2">PORTABILITY</th>
     </tr>
     <tr>
       <th>Reason</th>
       <th>Donor</th>
       <th>Claimant</th>
       <th>Donor</th>
       <th>Claimant</th>
     </tr>
   </thead>
   <tbody>
     <tr>
       <td>USER_REQUESTED</td>
       <td>✓</td>
       <td></td>
       <td>✓</td>
       <td></td>
     </tr>
     <tr>
       <td>ACCOUNT_CLOSURE</td>
       <td></td>
       <td></td>
       <td>✓</td>
       <td></td>
     </tr>
     <tr>
       <td>DEFAULT_OPERATION</td>
       <td>✓</td>
       <td></td>
       <td></td>
       <td></td>
     </tr>
   </tbody>
</table>

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"title":"Root Type for PixDICTClaimConfirmRequest","description":"","required":["reason"],"type":"object","properties":{"reason":{"description":"Operation reason","enum":["USER_REQUESTED","ACCOUNT_CLOSURE","FRAUD","DEFAULT_OPERATION","RECONCILIATION"],"type":"string"}},"example":{"reason":"USER_REQUESTED"}},"examples":{"CreatePixDICTClaimConfirmRequest":{"value":{"reason":"USER_REQUESTED"}}}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
